description:
Are you just entering into the IT field?

Is it time for a change?

Struggling to update your IT resume?

Not getting noticed on Dice, Monster, or other IT job boards?

What if I told you that you could hire a professional IT resume writer and learn all of his secrets about writing IT resumes that get you noticed by IT Recruiters and Hiring Managers?

Would you be interested in learning about it or just keep on struggling with writing an interview-generating IT resume?

Typical IT Resume Writer Charges $199, $297, or More...

Go on the Internet and do a search for IT Resume Writing and any IT resume writer worth anything will start at $199...

Howdi, my name is Ivan Hurt and I'm a Certified Professional Resume Writer.

I worked as a desktop support tech for over 10 years, until I went through an ugly outsourcing. So, I decided to change careers and become an IT Resume Writer. As an IT Resume Writer, I develop the Refactoring Your IT Resume system that almost guaranteed all of my candidates got called in for an interview.
  
Why am I sharing this information with you?

Simple, I can't possibly write an IT resume for every IT professional on the planet, so I created this course.

In this course, you will learn

  • The Real Reason Your Resume Is So Important
  • Why most IT resume writing advice is malarkey
  • 3 Things IT Recruiters Want To See In Your IT Resume
  • Finding Keywords For Your IT Resume
  • Why Write A Career Summary Instead Of An Objective
  • Using Your Experience To Your Advantage
  • How To Write Your Experience That Will Make Recruiters Drool

You also have a 30-day money back guarantee if you aren't 100% satisfied with our work. Enroll now and land a new IT job.
title: Refactoring Your IT Resume
